lead_paragraph: As he walked down the 18th fairway after setting himself up for a potential eagle, Jason Day searched for a scoreboard. When he saw he was three shots behind Jimmy Walker, Day flipped his putter in the air and didn't catch it as it dropped to the ground.

headline.print_headline: Jason Day Finishes 2nd in PGA Championship Title Defense
headline.main: Jason Day Finishes 2nd in PGA Championship Title Defense
